scripts.dev: npm run clean; npm run start
scripts.start: bash -c 'export PORT=${PORT:-9002} && export HOST=${HOST:-0.0.0.0} && concurrently --kill-others "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:frontend"'
scripts.start:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && export PYTHONPATH=$PYTHONPATH:$(dirname $(pwd)) && BACKEND_PORT=5001 python app.py
